channel.title: 🏢 Department of Computer Science, University College London on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Computer Science, University College London on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Analysing the Generalisation and Reliability of Steering Vectors
item.description: Steering vectors, while promising for controlling LLMs, show unreliable in- and out-of-distribution performance, highlighting crucial limitations for real-world applications.
